The Miracle of The Quran

The Miracle of The Quran by Nouman Ali Khan at IIUM during the 2013 Malaysian Tour. Held at the Putra World Trade Centre, Kuala Lumpur on the 6th Sep 2013.

Podcast   /   The Miracle of The Quran

Nouman Ali Khan

Nouman Ali Khan is a Pakistani-American Muslim speaker and founder, CEO and lead instructor at Bayyinah, the Institute for Arabic and Qur'anic Studies.

#1 They Called Him The Magician

Extract 1 from the "Miracle of The Quran" delivered at the Putra World Trade Centre (PWTC), Kuala Lumpur on the 6th Sep 2013 during his 2013 Malaysian Tour.
